title: get fails
body:
by **daveyostcom**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?

0 298 Z% export GOPATH=$(pwd)                         
0 299 Z% bin/go get code.google.com/p/go.talks/present
# cd .; hg clone -U https://code.google.com/p/go.talks
/Users/yost/p/go/go/src/code.google.com/p/go.talks
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/local/bin/hg", line 4, in <module>
    import pkg_resources
  File "/System/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/2.7/Extras/lib/python/pkg_resources.py", line 2603, in <module>
    working_set.require(__requires__)
  File "/System/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/2.7/Extras/lib/python/pkg_resources.py", line 666, in require
    needed = self.resolve(parse_requirements(requirements))
  File "/System/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/2.7/Extras/lib/python/pkg_resources.py", line 565, in resolve
    raise DistributionNotFound(req)  # XXX put more info here
pkg_resources.DistributionNotFound: mercurial==1.3.1
package code.google.com/p/go.talks/present: exit status 1
1 300 Z% 

What is the expected output?
 The get should succeed

What do you see instead?
Python dies

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?


Which operating system are you using?
OS X 10.8.3

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
go version devel +267bb9854177 Wed Apr 03 18:23:43 2013 -0700 darwin/amd64

Please provide any additional information below.
